channel.title: CVE Feed for j0hnsmith -- Testimonials Widget
channel.description: The latest CVEs for j0hnsmith -- Testimonials Widget

item.title: CVE-2024-4705|2024-06-07T19:24:48.344Z -- j0hnsmith -- testimonials%20widget
item.description: The Testimonials Widget plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the plugin's testimonials shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 4.0.4 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping on user supplied attributes. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
